mapper.insert: insert into time_line_item (time_line_item_id, create_time, msg, `type`, update_time) values (#{timeLineItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select time_line_item_id, create_time, msg, `type`, update_time from time_line_item
